EmailTemplate.name: Webinar - Tasktop - APAC - 2015.09.24.Email - Invite 1 - Tasktop - APAC
EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar: Leveraging the Power of Tosca Connect and Tasktop Sync
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Leveraging the Power of Tosca Connect and Tasktop Sync
Hi {{lead.First Name}},
Combining the power of enterprise software testing with Software Lifecycle Integration enables enterprises to connect their automated testing with development processes to lower business risk and accelerate innovation.
Join Michael Jahn of Tasktop and Gernot Brandl of Tricentis as they share how Tosca Connect, powered by Tasktop Sync:
- Removes the barriers to test automation and - Enables Tosca Testsuite to be seamlessly integrated into your software development
Register now <http://www.tricentis.com/resource-assets/leveraging-the-power-of-tosca-connect-and-tasktop-sync-apac-20150924?utm_medium=email&utm_source=db> for the free webinar, Leveraging the Power of Tosca Connect and Tasktop Sync, on September 24th, 2015, at 3:00 PM AEST. See you there! Best regards,
The Tricentis Webinar Team
<http://www.tricentis.com/resource-assets/leveraging-the-power-of-tosca-connect-and-tasktop-sync-apac-20150924?utm_medium=email&utm_source=db>
<http://www.tricentis.com/resource-assets/leveraging-the-power-of-tosca-connect-and-tasktop-sync-apac-20150924?utm_medium=email&utm_source=db> Thu, Sep 24, 2015
3-4 pm Sydney
1-2 pm Perth
5-6 pm Auckland
Gernot Brandl
Product Manager
Tricentis
Michael Jahn
Tasktop
